messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1890
messages.msgSnippet: ... this thread has had me thinking (remember beauty and the beast? lefou I m afraid I ve been thinking, sings gaston; lefou replies, a dangerous pastime!
messages.messageBody:
>I don't always WANT to strew, or think of choices,
>or get involved in my kids' interests, or trust that
>they are learning or get involved in seeing learning
>their way --

this thread has had me thinking (remember beauty and
the beast? "lefou I'm afraid I've been thinking,"
sings gaston; lefou replies, "a dangerous pastime!"
"I know!" sings gaston :D). sometimes it seems so
HARD, and I just can't think of what to strew... it's
a creativity thing, I think... as I was reading this
post, I thought, aha! it's Strewer's Block! once you
get unstuck it flows, at least for a while. probably
yet another reason I should stay on task with my
writing...

Julia
